actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To modify the Suwannee River navigation project, Florida, to authorize dredging of the McGriff Pass instead of the East and Alligator Passes.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Amends Federal law making appropriations to improve the Suwannee River, Florida, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to dredge the McGriff Pass instead of the East Pass and Alligator (West) Pass in accordance with the terms and conditions which apply to the dredging of the East and Alligator Passes.

titles.title: To modify the Suwannee River navigation project, Florida, to authorize dredging of the McGriff Pass instead of the East and Alligator Passes.
